Mary M. Rogers

  1. Foster Name: Mary M.
  2. Foster Family: Rudolph and Mary Liable Kramer
  3. Location of Family: Stuart, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Stuart, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 12/16/1910, Bronx, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1/17/2003
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Mary Tenopir
  11. Spouse Name: Emil Tenopir
  12. Source: Holt County Historical Society List of Children; Marilyn Irvin Holt. The Orphan Trains: Placing Out in America (University of Nebraska Press, 1992), p. 110-111; Crossroads vol. 20, 1992, p. 15; Patricia J. Young, and Frances E. Marks. Tears on Paper: The History and Life Stories of the Orphan Train Riders (n.p., 1990), p. 260-269; Lincoln Star, 26 August 1987; www.usgennet - for Mary Tenopir.
